ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.4"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10652)/@code="67796-3" EMS Disposition Section (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10651)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title and SHOULD equal "EMS Disposition" (CONF:10654)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:10653)

MAY contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:10656)
This entry SHALL conform to Derived Entry template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.24)
This entry SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation (CONF:10663)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10665)/@code="67547-0" EMS Number of patients (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10664)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type INT (CONF:10666)
NEMSIS Trace: eScene.06

MAY contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:10657)
This entry SHALL conform to Derived Entry template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.24)
This entry SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation (CONF:10667)

This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD (CONF:10670), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet IncidentOutcome 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.64 STATIC (CONF:10671)
NEMSIS Trace: EDisposition.12
